summary: Quick guide for new commers and smalls dll files to enable NVidia driver to Skyrim and some tweaked lists.
descriptionHtml:
Specs:Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-2328M CPU @ 2,20GHz 2.20GHz
Ram:4,00 GB
Core Prossecor: Quadro
OS: x64
Nvidia GeForce 610m
Windwos 10
______________________________________________________________________________
i am using my pc in other language so some of these may differ,I am just trying
to translate it in the best way I can
I found out a simple guide to set up my Vram on Internet.You can find vram
set up to Control Panel->System and Security->Advanced System Settings->
Advanced->Performances->Adcanced->Virtual Memory->
Set the:
Original size to :2432 (without enb 8192 runs ok)
Maximum size to :9192
______________________________________________________________________________
-First of all download and update every driver as it seems some drivers can't
update themeselves.Probably you will need NVidia's driver and Direct X.
Java maybe will be needed(both 32x and 64x required for 64x system) 
if you have any dynamic mods(dynamics mods at the end of load order 
always like ASIS).
After that make sure that your Skyrim folder will be installed outside
Programm files and Programm Files x84 because you will mess up with 
Wrye Bash.Recommended because Program Files use security with
this file and you will have a hard time to change it.Everything outside
Program files...you can use c:\ instead no problem or other path.
______________________________________________________________________________
______________________________________________________________________________
-Content that I download for my pc:
First of All this is Legendary Edition Skyrim download from sites.Starts
at 13 GB.(My final game folder with mods is 25.5 GB)

(file downloadable and files added and uploaded from me(small files
like .dll and skyrim.ini in nexus after some research)
______________________________________________________________________________
-Skyrim prefs and skse .ini fully tweaked to let you use more memory,
preload memory patch and more threads,used crash fixes and bug fixes,
if you use Alternatibe Start maybe you will need and the Fuz Ro Da to make
npcs speak at the right momment.
-Downloaded SKSE version 1_07_03 (dowload on your own and read documents
then replace with any file that i add)
(file downloadable)
______________________________________________________________________________
______________________________________________________________________________
-d3d9.dll downloaded from random source on internet that enables the use
of NVidia driver.
-D3DX9_42.dll from D3DX9_42.dll - Wrapper v3 (this is for the preloader patch
,makes skse to preload plugins
skse.ini Tweaked for memory patch too->AllocateMemory
(files added)
______________________________________________________________________________
______________________________________________________________________________
-LOOT v0.11.0 (this will sort your load order,have some notes of your mods
about their load order because sometimes unpopular mods LOOT can't
sort them correctly.If you use combat mods and AL enemies,i recommend
to set them at the lowst place before any merge and bash patch for maximum
challenge and you can use difficulty level in-game to change the damages.
I use DUEL-Combat Relism and Combat Evolve at the same time in the exact
load order as I have them below(some other mod too to make an example to
how we loard order merged patch,bashed patch and a dynamic mod):
.Duel - Combat Relism
.Combat Evolve             (after them goes the bash patch and merged patch)
.merged patch    (TES5Edit)
.bashed patch    (Wrye Bash)
.asis    (Dynamic Mod,Needs Java[x32,x64])
-Additional it will generate information about dirty plugins so that you will
have to clear them with TES5Edit.It helps with tags for the Wrye Bash use,
to tag them on your own(you need research here) but not necessarily.
______________________________________________________________________________
______________________________________________________________________________
-TES5Edit V3,2 (many sites have the 230,use this version instead)
-To clean the files is better to clean them one by one as if you do this
on many mods at the same time maybe you will encounter negative results.
-To clean DLCs you will have to tick each mod with Update and then clean
only the DLC.
-How to clean ITM(Identical to Master)
1.select the mod you want
2.right click->Apply filter for cleaning->finished->
right click->Remove "Identical to Master" records->right click->
Undelete and disable references.
3.After finished you will have to exit and make sure Back Up box is ticked.
4.(autosave)
______________________________________________________________________________
Merged Patch
1.To make merged patch tick everything except Skyrim.
2.then just right click on one mod but not selected
3.go to options->Create Merged Patch
then messages about experimental uses of some features will pop up,don't worry
have the courage and go on
4.go to merged patch,delete leveled lists->select merged patch ->right click->
clean masters and exit->backup box ticked ,etc.
5.you will make leveled lists from Wrye Bash cause TES5Edit isn't good for
this.(See below)
______________________________________________________________________________
______________________________________________________________________________
-Wrye Bash(for a bashed patch) (version 307)
Make sure dynamic mods aren't loaded in Data Files,you will tick them after
bashed patch.
1.Open Wrye Bash
2.Check if every mod you want to use selected
3.Tick Merged Patch
4.Click Bashed Patch,right click->rebuild patch->if don't want more
researches and you don't want to load more than 250 mods choose SKIP otherwise
watch carefully because if you let it merge mods with enemies dynamic patch
won't work properly.
5.Untick everything except leveled lists and watch if you want some tweaks
changed(some change the crime alarm to 1000 and timescale to 10 but you will
need research for this too.
6.Rebuild it.You are ready to go.Quit.
7.Check the Data Files to see if it is ticked with the order from above
(LOOT section)
______________________________________________________________________________
Ready to start skyrim.
Always start from SKSE Skyrim launcher.
______________________________________________________________________________
______________________________________________________________________________
Other programms used:
-Ordenador Optimize Textures.Highly Recommended.(You will need much time to do
this,maybe a whole day but it is worth it.
you set the path of your folder with BSAs and Textures probably Data.
tick: 
.mimaps 
.resize patterns 16x16
.resize down if>2048
-Tick BSAs and then go chech every BSA...a recommended way is one by one for
less corrupted files and negative results or select small files alongside 
small files.(I did make it the first time with every BSA in one optimize but
i couldn't use my pc for a while as it swallows the CPU.
Additional mod installed Skyrim Project Optimization - No Homes -Full Version
______________________________________________________________________________
______________________________________________________________________________
______________________________________________________________________________
-ENBoost didn't seem to help me with this pack.Use on your own risk.
-For HiAlgo Booust happens the same thing.Actually fps and more stuttering
happened.A logical explanation is that my pc can't handle the changes they
make.

Credits to:
Bethesda and modders for making our gaming experience even better.
author: yobas
